message: Bob, I have a unique opportunity for you. I'm offering you a product that I believe holds significant value. While I can't disclose the specifics just yet, I can assure you it's worth no less than $1200000 to me. I'm confident it has the potential to be even more valuable for you. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1500000. This is a limited-time offer, so please let me know your decision soon.
